Cachable - Class in oldClasses.business
Cachable is an abstract class that all CACHABLE business objects extend.

cached_data - Variable in class oldClasses.persistence.CacheTable
Double Linked List --

Worst Case Scenario for finding a sorted ID in the cache table: (O) n / 2
Faster Inserting and Removing of objects, optimizing cache response time.
CacheTable - Class in oldClasses.persistence
 
CacheTable(Broker) - Constructor for class oldClasses.persistence.CacheTable
Broker parameter is purposefully unchecked because attempting to introduce strict rules prevents this from running.
CacheTable.FlushThread - Class in oldClasses.persistence
 
CacheTable.FlushThread(Broker<Cachable>) - Constructor for class oldClasses.persistence.CacheTable.FlushThread
Constructor that creates a thread to navigate a specific Broker's cache table as a daemon thread that will detect data that is modified and hasn't been saved, then saving it.
canAccessReports - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canAccessReports is a permission to allow users to view and create reports.
canChangePermissions - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canChangePermissions is a permission that allows the current employee level to modify permissions of lower levels.
canDelete() - Method in class oldClasses.business.Cachable
TODO (like canEdit, but even managers cannot delete an employee object.
canEdit() - Method in class oldClasses.business.Cachable
TODO
canEditSchedule - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canEditSchedule is a permission that allows a user to call methods in ScheduleBroker successfully that add/edit/delete shifts and a-e-d employees from those shifts.
canRead() - Method in class oldClasses.business.Cachable
TODO
canReadLogs - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canReadLogs is a permission more for administrators and those interested in viewing program history for violations and irregular unexpected behavior.
canReadOldSchedule - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canReadOldSchedule is a dependancy permission for a user to create reports (but not required) and allows viewing of schedules that are past the current date.
canReadSchedule - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canReadSchedule is a permission that allows a user to view the current saved schedule.
canRequestDaysOff - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canRequestDaysOff is a permission that allows a user to request days off from a higher permission level user, in most cases this will be based on their job or designated supervisor/authority, and will be dependant on their maxDaysOff and will require authentication via a notification to user's authority.
canSendNotifications - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canSendNotifications is a permission that allows a user to send their own notification, as opposed to a system generated notification, to a user or users.
canTakeEmergencyDays - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
This should always remain true for an employee unless it is abused; canTakeEmergencyDays is a permission that overrides procedures to book a day off as it is assumed that an emergency situation has occured that stops a user from coming into work.
canTakeVacations - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canTakeVacations is a permission that is similar to the canRequestDaysOff.
canViewInactiveEmployees - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canViewInactiveEmployees is a permission that allows a user to not only queue inactive employee profiles when making requests of the system, but also browse their resource information like a normal employee.
canViewResources - Variable in class business.permissions.Permissions
canViewResources is a permission that allows a user to view employees, their hours working, their status whether on vacation, emergency leave, shift traded, or other defined statuses.
closeAllLogs() - Static method in class messagelog.Logging
Goes through the linked list using an iterator to close all log files.
closeLogFile() - Method in class messagelog.LogFile

con_manager - Static variable in class oldClasses.application.ConnectionManager
